mapper.sql: id, parentId, version, code, name, remarks, sortNum, is_Enable, is_Delete, ownerId, createId, updateId, createTime, updateTime,fkType,fkPkId,suffix,streamData
mapper.insert: insert into tb_attachments (id, parentId, version, code, name, remarks, sortNum, is_Enable, is_Delete, ownerId, createId, updateId, createTime, updateTime,fkType,fkPkId,suffix,streamData) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_Enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{is_Delete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fkType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fkPkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{streamData,jdbcType=BLOB})
mapper.update: update tb_attachments set parentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, version = version+1, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortNum = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_Enable = #{is_Enable,jdbcType=BIT}, is_Delete = #{is_Delete,jdbcType=BIT}, ownerId = #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updateId = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fkType = #{fkType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fkPkId = #{fkPkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suffix = #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, streamData = #{streamData,jdbcType=BLOB} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update tb_attachments set is_Delete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from tb_attachments where is_Enable=1 and is_Delete=0 order by sortNum
